patterns_discovered.description: Session created comprehensive documentation before manual testing, enabling code review-based verification
9 test scenarios with clear setup, steps, expected outcomes, and acceptance criteria
Multiple complementary documentation artifacts created to support different audiences (code review, QA, developers, CI/CD)
Explicit mapping of acceptance criteria to verification status with clear pass/fail indicators
Low-risk determination based on code review enabling verification without full manual testing execution
patterns_discovered.rationale: Code review confirms correct implementation following React best practices

gotchas_discovered.description: Code review verified implementation but manual browser testing remains as 'TO BE EXECUTED' - risk of discrepancy between code and runtime behavior
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: MANUAL_TEST_CHECKLIST provides clear execution path (15-20 min estimate)

gotchas_discovered.description: Auth endpoint detection using string matching (/auth/ URL check) could have edge cases with non-standard endpoint naming
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Documented in verification results with specific check: isAuthEndpoint pattern

gotchas_discovered.description: Test 9 verifies single toast visibility but rapid API calls could still queue toasts - only visual verification confirms this
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: MANUAL_TEST_CHECKLIST Test 9 specifically addresses rapid click scenario

gotchas_discovered.description: Acceptance criteria distinguishes between 'console.error for debugging' (acceptable) vs 'unhandled promise rejections' (not acceptable) - subjective determination
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Test 8 in checklist provides clear verification instructions with specific categories

gotchas_discovered.description: 9 pages verified through code review but actual error handling behavior requires runtime execution
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Risk marked as LOW due to code quality, but manual tests remain 'recommended'

key_deliverables: MANUAL_TEST_CHECKLIST.md - 9 test scenarios with time estimates

verification_results.acceptance_criteria: ✅ 7/9 VERIFIED via code review, 2/9 pending manual execution

progress_update.phase: Extended Error Handling Coverage → Integration Verification

recommendations.recommendation: Execute MANUAL_TEST_CHECKLIST.md with all 9 test scenarios to complete verification (15-20 minutes estimated)
recommendations.rationale: Code review confirms implementation but runtime behavior verification required for sign-off

recommendations.recommendation: Add npm run build and npm run test checks to CI/CD pipeline as per VERIFICATION_SUMMARY.md recommendations
recommendations.rationale: Prevent regressions and ensure TypeScript compilation in automated pipeline

recommendations.recommendation: Consider Playwright or Cypress E2E tests for the 9 test scenarios to reduce manual testing burden
recommendations.rationale: Would automate manual_test_checklist steps and provide regression detection

recommendations.recommendation: Keep MANUAL_TEST_CHECKLIST.md updated alongside feature changes to toast or auth handling
recommendations.rationale: Checklist provides clear testing guide but requires maintenance as implementation evolves

recommendations.recommendation: Add JSDoc comments to ToastProvider hook methods for better developer experience
recommendations.rationale: Enhanced code maintainability and IDE autocomplete support

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding handling for network timeout errors separate from API failures
recommendations.rationale: Current implementation groups all failures but user experience differs between connection loss and server errors
